content: अमतिः [अम्-अति <ls>Uṇ. 4. 59</ls>] {@--1@} Time. {@--2@} The moon. {@--3@} (<ab>Ved.</ab>) Form, shape (Nir). {@--4@} Want, poverty. {%--<ab>a.</ab>%} , --अमतीवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Evil-minded, wicked (दुष्ट, अप्रशस्तबुद्धिमत् <ls>Sāy.</ls>). {@--2@} Poor.

अमति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Evil-minded, wicked, depraved. --तिः A rogue, cheat. --तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Ignorance, unconsciousness, absence of knowledge, intention, or fore-thought; अमत्यैतानि षड् जग्ध्वा <ls>Ms. 5. 20</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 222.</ls> For some of the other senses see under अम्.
